Temporary fix for version 8.7 and future versions possibly. This resets the daily limit to 0 each time. Make sure you open the reg file in notepad and change your e-mail address to the one you log into myspace with.

When 50 limit is reached close FBP and then import the reg and start it up again. Sucks but it works temporarily.
